languages.text: Дознаватель хочет подвести итоги миссии и запросил аудиенцию с Лордом-капитаном.
The Interrogator wishes to debrief after the mission and has requested an audience with the Lord Captain.
languages.original_text: Дознаватель хочет подвести итоги миссии и запросил аудиенцию с Лордом-капитаном.

traits.locale_text: The Interrogator wishes to debrief after the mission and has requested an audience with the Lord Captain.
The Interrogator wishes to debrief after the mission and has requested an audience with the Lord Captain.

languages.text: 审讯官希望能在任务结束后进行汇报，并请求与领主舰长会面。
languages.original_text: The Interrogator wishes to debrief after the mission and has requested an audience with the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: 审讯官希望能在任务结束后进行汇报，并请求与领主舰长会面。

languages.text: インテロゲイターは任務完了後の報告のためにロード・キャプテンとの謁見を求めている。
languages.original_text: The Interrogator wishes to debrief after the mission and has requested an audience with the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: インテロゲイターは任務完了後の報告のためにロード・キャプテンとの謁見を求めている。

languages.text: El Interrogador quiere hablar tras la misión, para lo que solicita una audiencia con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán.
languages.original_text: The Interrogator wishes to debrief after the mission and has requested an audience with the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: El Interrogador quiere hablar tras la misión, para lo que solicita una audiencia con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán.

languages.text: Der Interrogator möchte sich nach der Mission besprechen und bittet den Lord Captain um eine Audienz.
languages.original_text: The Interrogator wishes to debrief after the mission and has requested an audience with the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Der Interrogator möchte sich nach der Mission besprechen und bittet den Lord Captain um eine Audienz.

languages.text: L'interrogateur souhaite faire le point après cette mission et a sollicité une audience auprès {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: The Interrogator wishes to debrief after the mission and has requested an audience with the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: L'interrogateur souhaite faire le point après cette mission et a sollicité une audience auprès {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: Sorgucu, görevin ardından bir değerlendirme yapmak için Lord Kaptan'la görüşme talep etti.
languages.original_text: The Interrogator wishes to debrief after the mission and has requested an audience with the Lord Captain.
